comment: Geology has proven there was no global flood so the Bible cannot be accurate. If it is inaccurate in its basic story about the history of the world there is no reason to believe it when it describes miracles that cannot be documented one way or the other. It is one thing to believe without evidence, it is quite another to believe AGAINST evidence.
